code: const resolveApiBaseUrl=()=>{const envUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL;if(envUrl&&envUrl.trim().length>0){return envUrl;}if(typeof window!=='undefined'&&window.location){return"".concat(window.location.origin,"/api");}return'http://localhost:3001/api';};export const API_BASE_URL=resolveApiBaseUrl();export default API_BASE_URL;
